import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { deleteProduct, getAllProduct } from '../API/ApiProduct' export default function ViewProduct() { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]) const loadProducts = async () => { const result = await getAllProduct() setProducts(result) } useEffect(() => { loadProducts() }, []) const handleDelete = async (pid) => { await deleteProduct(pid) loadProducts() } return (

{index + 1} {item.name} {item.sold} {item.createDate}
) }
